descriptionHtml:
[Note]
Crafting - Get the book \"How to Make Chainmail\" from Alvor.
Category - Light Armor, Scaled
Armor rating ? Scaled Armor
Weight = Scaled Armor

[Update]
v1.1 - Added male version (Novice, Apprentice and Adept).
v2.0 - Added male version (Master).
